short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage bookmarks in a CLI fashion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmarkr Directives is a chrome extension that allows you to interact with several parts of the chrome api, specifically bookmarks, in a CLI style. You can add, open, move, copy, and remove bookmarks using the omnibox. There is also support for creating alarms.
